<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 12"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Expert Wizard Spellcasting](/Feats.aspx?ID=748) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Archetype" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=12" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 231 <sup>4.0</sup></row>

**Archetype** [Wizard](/Archetypes.aspx?ID=12)

**Prerequisites**
[Basic Wizard Spellcasting](/Feats.aspx?ID=745); Master in [Arcana](/Skills.aspx?ID=2)

</column>

---

You gain the expert spellcasting benefits.

<title level="2">Expert Wizard Spellcasting leads to...</title>
[Master Wizard Spellcasting](/Feats.aspx?ID=749)
name: Expert Wizard Spellcasting
prerequisite: Basic Wizard Spellcasting; Master in Arcana
